Tristan Biography

Dutch Soul Group Tristan have topped the UK Soul Charts twice and are regularly playlisted on Jazz FM.
Tristan's music can best be described as feel good vintage Acid Jazz music with the energy, vibe and sound of 2016 by some of today’s best contemporary jazz musicians from Europe.
Funky rhythm-guitars, Hammond, Fender Rhodes and synths, and a rhythm section that has been playing together for decades are topped off with Evelyn Kallansee's voice.
Tristan have been compared in sound to Tower of Power, Incognito & Snarky Puppy.

Evelyn Kallansee - Vocals
Coen Molenaar - Hammond & Rhodes
Frans Vollink – Bass
Sebastiaan Cornelissen – Drums
Guy Nikkels - Guitar
